itemDescription: Welsh cricketer, and rugby league footballer (1923-2005)

wikipedia_page.main: Bill Watkins DFC (18 January 1923 – 15 March 2005) was a Welsh cricketer and decorated World War II aviator.  Watkins was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm leg break googly.  He was born at Swansea, Glamorgan.

response: William or Bill Watkins may refer to:
* Bill Watkins (Seagate) (born c. 1953), CEO of Seagate Technology

link_mentions.page: List of Glamorgan County Cricket Club players
